result.reason: Feature request to enable community extensions and integrations without modifying the core application, a standard feature for connection managers.
result.approach: Define IPlugin interface in a new shared assembly; implement PluginManager to discover and load DLLs using Reflection/MEF; add UI hooks in FrmMain to expose plugin functionality.
